name: Hungover Hero
description:
AFTER SUBMITTING I NOTICED THE WEB VERSION DIDN'T CAPTURE THE MOUSE. I HAD TO RE-EXPORT AS WINDOWS AND UPLOAD THAT. MY APOLOGIES!

Play as a hungover guy, just trying to find something to make him feel better.

Controls:
WASD - Move
Space - Jump
Click - Attack
Q/Mouse Wheel - Switch Weapons (When they are found)

I unfortunately ran out of time, and the final cutscene piece of the game has no voiceover. I plan to add it all in post-jam.

There's a bug with the gles2 version, which sometimes makes shadows not work properly. EDIT: This version is not currently availble! As per the message at the top.

I've uploaded a windows version that's gles3 that fixes the problem, I believe

Attribution and resources used: https://pastebin.com/NYiziij3

Dev log will be coming in the next few days!
